content:
Add an Image to a FlexCard

Add an image to a FlexCard in the FlexCard Designer. With the Image element, upload an image from your computer, use an image from a Salesforce library, enter a URL, or use a merge field from a data source.

From the FlexCard Designer, drag an Image element into a state on the canvas.
Update the element name in the Element Name field (optional).
Select the Image Source using one of these options:
Enter the absolute URL of the image to display an image from an external source.
Click the search icon and click Upload Files to upload a file from your computer.
Click the search icon and select an image from the Select an Image from Content Document dropdown to use a file from a library in your Salesforce CRM Content or Salesforce Files.

To adjust the size of the image relative to the canvas size, select an option from the Size dropdown (optional).
Adjust the element size on the canvas as needed.
Enter text describing the image in the Alternative Text field for accessibility.
Enter a Newport, SLDS, or custom CSS class in the Extra Class field (optional).

For more information:
See FlexCards Image Properties
See Style FlexCard Elements.
title: Adding Images to FlexCards
